title: Find a new book recommendations
author: jason
readme:
Receive a new book recommendation each Friday from [Open Library](https://openlibrary.org/). You can select the subject from [thousands of options](https://openlibrary.org/subjects) and have a new recommendation delivered to you automatically.

![20210108 04_49_1Book Recommendation.png](https://f000.backblazeb2.com/file/n8n-website-images/156219a1d3584a448874abbc9c540346.png)
readme_zh:
每周五从[开放图书馆](https://openlibrary.org/)获取一本新书推荐。您可以从[数千种主题](https://openlibrary.org/subjects)中选择感兴趣的分类，系统将自动为您推送新书推荐。

![20210108 04_49_1Book Recommendation.png](https://f000.backblazeb2.com/file/n8n-website-images/156219a1d3584a448874abbc9c540346.png)
